snippet.title: Unsafe Express - Release Gameplay Trailer | Multiplayer horror survival game
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1756160/Unsafe_Express/

Unsafe Express is a cooperative first-person survival horror game for 1-4 players. 

About This Game:
Navigate through space stations, collect materials and outlast your enemies! Choose your objective based on complexity levels, then cast your vote. Gather items, exterminate hostiles, fulfill missions and repeat!

Features:
1-4 PLAYER ONLINE COOP
PROXIMITY VOICE CHAT
MANY TOOLS AND ITEMS TO CHOOSE FROM
CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER
YOU MUST PET THE CAT
TRAUMATIC EXPERIENCES WITH ALIEN LIFEFORMS (BONUS!)
CREATIVE WAYS TO DIE
NOT SO MANY CREATIVE WAYS TO KILL

👉Help us improve!
Please give us your thoughts and ideas on the game, we are here to improve and we need your help to keep doing what we love!
